After like 30 minutes of debating with each other we finally decided to go see "The Bad News Bears". oOMg it was SOo sOO funny! after the movie i dropped James off then went Home. Today i got up + went to The RiBfEst to see the car show with James. it was coOl i guess. if you like that sort of thing. bUt yeahh. tHats My lovely liFe. welp James just called me soO i am gonna get up outta here. Heyy! SOrryy i havent updated lately bUt you pRobably already know i was at the BeaCh last week. i hadd buNches of fun with my boyfriend/bestfriend - JAMES LEE! i love you <3 oOh yeahh i forgot to tell everyone.. me + james had been datin 4 moNths on the 19th! Monday // me + james went up to Water Ways. it was really fun. they werent that cRowded or anything. it was great. we left there and just went back to his house and sit around for the rest of the evening. Today i wOke up cleaned out my closet + drawers of the clothes i def. didnt want anymore. then i went outside and tried to mow the grass but our lawn mower messed up?. but anyways. i went to James's house and we cleaned out somethings before he moVes. then we just sit aROund until i went to Practice at 6:00. yeahh i am really bOred now.. but soo tired. i dont wanna do anything but sleep. i aM gonna gO get me a shower and lay dOwn. BYee* <3 i love you

xO` brianna

p.s. i miss my only friend.. CHRISTINA LYNN* lol.

welp lEt's see. I have been gone for the past week. Wednesday me + james left to go camoing with my family. we went to Long's Retreat in Ohio. we had a lOt of funn. bUt we def. missed a lOt while we were goNe. we came home on MOnday. Jerrika had her baby. i havvent seen it yet thOugh. i bet he's a cUtie!! anyways.. monday when i gOt home i droPped James off then went to Christina's hOuse. we just drove around for awhile. then i met up with James and we went back to his house. we met up with christina, seth, megan, + matt at James B.'s hOuse. we watched his awesome fireworks. then went home. i spent the night with Christina + Megan! this morning i woke up + ate then i came home<3 i toOK a bathh then layed down and toOk a napp. i slept until like 5:00.. i had to get up and gO to practice at 6:00. after practice i went overr to my baby bOy's hOuse. we just got on the computer + watched tv. then we went to get some fOod. of course i was hungrey lol* but for now i gotta gO. i am watching mtv. BYee* <3 i love you

David piCked me up at 2:30 and we headed to Buffalo. We played Buffalo first - Winfield second (( i hit a homerun )) oOh yeahh! lol* it was fOr James <3 then we played Wayne but the freshman played the whoLe game because the starters played the two other games. we left and i came home. i made some buttered potatoes. they were really good. i tooK a shower + called James and Christina. nOw i am here .. watching Mtv. Tomorrow me + James are leaaving to go camping!! YAY* i am excited. i need a break from softball and home. i cant wait * we are gonan have tOns of fuN! soO holla. BYee* <3 i love you

xO` tiffani brianna

welp. let's see here! Sunday - which was yesterday. i woke up around 12:30 and just layed in bedd until 2:00. i went to lift weights at 2:00. came home + washed my car. i even swept it out + cleaned the inside. I was going to stay home all day yesterday but i forgot about meeting Matt's girlfriend Whitney! soO i went over to James's hOuse after he got off work at 7:00. Matt + Whitney came over and we all went to Ridenour. ((or however you spell it)) we walked on a nature trail + played on the playground. lol* it was soo much funN! James went to Matt's then they went to Seth's! they camped out again! uGhh people were blowin up my phone all night. i wanted to throw it against the walL! bUt i didnt. yeahh my car is really dirrty again. i am madd..... oOh yeahh that reminds me - the fuse to my amp is blown! which pisses me off soO badd! nOw i have to go buy a new one. oHh well i guess. i got up this morning. got readyy then piCked up Sam + toOK him to Go-Mart to get some cigarettes + i had to get gas anyways. i toOk him back to his house and i headed to Nitro tO my baby bOy's hOuse! he was sleeping soO i just got on the computer. i was hungrey soO i went to Subway and came back and he was still sleeping. he is soO lAzZy! bUt i gotta love hiM! around 2:30 he gOt up + got readyy. we went over to Matt's tO get his pillow then to my house. i was supposed to stop back at Sam's tO get my T.I. cd because he borrowed it to buRn but he left with his dad. sOO i went on home. James is outside right now mowing my grass. lol* he lOoks soO weird on a lawn mower!! haha* but i think he is done soo i gotta go outside and shOw him what all he has to weed eat! BYee* <3 i love you

I want a boy.
A nice and bad boy.
He'll tell me we're like Corey and Topanga.
He'll give me his favorite sweatshirt.
He'll call me at 3am and ask me what i'm doing.
He'll tell me he couldn't fall asleep because he was thinking about me, and he needed to hear my voice.
He'll text me every morning before school saying "Have a great day babe I love you!".
And he always whispers something sweet in my ear.
He'll take me to a concert to see his favorite band.
And he wont get embarrassed to tell me he loves me in front of his friends.
When I cry he'll tell me I'm too beautiful to and he'll kiss every tear.
He'll always make me feel better because he knows the perfect things to say to me.
All of his friends will know we're in love because he'll talk about me to them.
He'll stay up with me all night when im sick.
When we're walking together he'll stop and pick up a flower and put it behind my ear.
He'll love everything about me and tell me that I'm perfect.
We always end up laughing about silly fights.
We wont get mad for making fun of each other because we crack up at every bit of it.
Even if we're a million years old, butterflies will still go crazy inside of me ... Every time he kisses me.
He'll tell me he'd die without me.
He'll surprise me by bringing me over my favorite food when I'm having a bad day.
He would think I was beautiful if I dressed so crappy it was classy.
he wouldnt be scared to cry in front of me--
--and would hold me when i cry ..
he'll introduce me to his friends as the coolest girl he's ever met.
We would have contests of how far we could spit our gum, or how far we could jump off a swing.
He'll take walks with me in the snow, and we'll catch *snowflakes* on our tongues
He would grab my waist and kiss my neck.
And we'd always take pictures in photo booths.
He'll let me go places with his mom.
We would play tag and not care whos watching. 
We'd kiss in the rain.
And when I hear him speak, I'll fall in love all over again.
I want a boy who can argue over stupid things with me,
and than go totally soft when I got sad and apologize.
I want someone who would lay with me outside under the stars.
Someone who will squirt me with water guns in the house
When we kissed our hips would be pressed together.
I want someone to be there no matter what ... always and forever *
